entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Old Crow
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:46 AM MST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Monday: Snow. High minus 27.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow beginning near noon. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 27. Wind chill minus 51 this morning and minus 36 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 31. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 31. Wind chill near minus 40. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 27.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h late in the morning. High minus 27. Wind chill minus 42 in the morning and minus 37 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 26. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 26. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 21. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. High minus 21. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Monday 26 December 2022
